summary: Replace the texture of the unique swords "Red Eagle's Fury" and "Red Eagle Bane"
descriptionHtml:
THIS ISN'T MY WORK! IT'S ONLY A SMALL ALTERATION OF THE ORIGINAL MOD "[b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/20939/?]Red Eagle's Bane - Redone by Urwy[/url]" [/b]TO ADD THE "[b]Red Eagle's Fury[/b]" IN THE MOD.

I'M NOT A DESIGNER, I WILL NOT ALTER/ADD ANY TEXTURE TO THE MOD. I'M NOT A EXPERIENCED MODDER, SO I WILL NOT SOLVE ANY BUGS OR PROBBLEMS. KEEP THEN ON THE ORIGINAL MOD THREAD.



[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/dv93l.png[/img][/center]


Description
===========
This mod is a small work to add the "Red Eagle's Fury" to the mod "[b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/20939/?]Red Eagle's Bane - Redone by Urwy[/url]﻿".[/b] I'm not affiliate to the Urwy. 

In this mod, we have 2 models:

Model 1 - Red Eagle's Fury [b][color=#ff0000]RED [/color]/ [/b]Red Eagle's Bane [b][color=#0000ff]BLUE
[/color][/b]Model 2 - Red Eagle's Fury [color=#0000ff][b]BLUE[/b][/color] / Red Eagle's Bane [color=#ff0000][b]RED

[/b][/color]Only the HighRes (2048x2048) textures used in this work.

Installation
============
Install with the NMM OR extract the content of the file in the /Data folder.

You DO NOT need the original mod, if you want this, uninstall the original.


Compatibility
=============
If someone want a compatibity patch to other mod let me know and i will do my best.



Credits
========
All the credit of this work is for Urwy, if you like this mod or the original, endorse the work of the Urwy.
author: Stuard
